# allometree: Allometric Scaling of Urban Trees

Develop and use allometric equations relating to the size and structure of urban trees. Visit the package website at <https://xp-song.github.io/allometree/>. See allometree in action at <https://xpsong.shinyapps.io/allometree-sg/>. 

## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# Install development version from GitHub
devtools::install_github("xp-song/allometree")
```

## Setup

```{r eval = FALSE}
library(allometree)
```
